main event: On June 2, 1967, two witnesses reported seeing a UFO in McKeesport, Pennsylvania for a duration of 3 to 6 seconds.
interesting points: One witness reported that the object made a 90-degree turn and then moved away quickly,The second witness stated that there was no motion or change in the object's course,Both witnesses observed a very bright light,One witness estimated the object's speed to be as high as 2229 mph,The investigation concluded that the most probable explanation was a bright meteor.
witness description: two civilians who reported seeing the object
